title: How to Make a Flame That Does Not Burn

steps.headline: Prepare a solution of one part alcohol, one part water and little table salt.
steps.description: Give the solution a magical-sounding name. Do not allow your audience to see the ingredients. Do not leave the solution open long enough to evaporate the alcohol.

steps.headline: Soak a dollar in the solution.
Hold the wet dollar up with metal tongs.
steps.description: Keep away from the bowl of solution.

steps.headline: Light the solution that is on the dollar.
The alcohol will ignite.
steps.description: The water will stay in the paper of the dollar protecting it from the flame.
